desc: We work with the creation of videos for families by using the video editor Pinnacle Studio 18.The task we need is very simple.You will receive a link with the photos (100-300 photos)We will give you a effects plugin that you need to install to your pinnacle studio 18.The effects come in a list numbered from 100 to 300.The job consists of adding the photos, then adding the effects and then adding the music we will provide you.We recommend you only bid if you have a good computer. This job is very easy and each video might take 30 to 35 minutes to conclude if you have a good computer. If your computer is slow you will have a very hard time and the job might take you from 1 hour to 1h30m.If you have enough RAM memory and the most important, a fast HD (the job requires opening and closing the effects plugin so the HD is what makes it open fast or slow) you could make the job in a smaller time.The payment for each video is 7$.You might start slowly but then we might give you 3 to 5 videos to work on at once.This is a long term project - We are looking for people that can work with us for 4 months to a year.To work in this project you need to have pinnacle studio 18 or get it.----------------------------------In summary:-Download the photos-Add the photos, effects and music-Send the video back to us
title: Creating videos by using Pinnacle Studio 18 - (Long Term)

desc: These are the functions and details I am looking for from the application: Functions & Details:Import .fbx files through an in-game dialog box similar to Symmetry Alpha (the current 3D model viewer)The import transfers animations, textures and 3D ModelVive Player able to teleport in room-scale VRA local player on the computer running the Vive who sees:Top down view of the modelAble to move the vive player around the modelPreset “scenes” which are locations to move Vive player to e.g. entrance, 1st floor, 2nd floorChange the time of dayRotate the model for correct compass directionCustom skybox from 360degree image for showing the view from the propertyThe ability to place and rearrange furniture in both players views similar to this WorldBuilder VR prototype [url removed, login to view]As well as the snapping to floor option as well as snapping to walls for professional layoutsInteractive items like teapots, cups, lamps, keyboards, doors and roller doors that are useable and in the example of a cup throwable.Doors are open and closable and roller doors have a button to activate the door (these are placeable items that are standard or come a couple of variations like glass doors and wooden doors.Menu “scene” with table top size version of 3D modelIn Menu “scene” also access to 360 videos on a side wall.3D Modelling:Modelling of foyer/reception for the “menu” scene.Furniture e.g desks, chairs, couches, cups, cars and pallet rackingIt would be great if you could send me a quote for the hours and how much you estimate it costing.
